many_attempts_locked_for.message: Too many attempts. Locked for $n$ minutes

many_attempts_next_attempt_in.message: Too many attempts. Next attempt in $n$ minutes

bind_group_url.message: Bind this group to the ($n$) URL. This will hide the group from everywhere else except this URL. It adds an extra layer of security

url_must_be_less_than.message: URL must be less than $n$ character

url_must_be_at_least.message: URL must be at least $n$ characters

ext_description.message: Browser extension that allows you to save and restore your tabs including encrypting them with a password

you_can_find_details_here.message: You can find all of your group details here

opened_tabs_times_tip.message: The number of times the tabs in this group have been opened at once. Not the individual tabs opened

error_no_group_selected.message: Something went wrong! No group selected

want_delete_group.message: Do you want to delete the group?

no_tabs_this_group.message: There are no tabs in this group

click_on_each_tab.message: Click on each tab to select or unselect it for saving to memory

enter_pass_unlock_content.message: Enter a password to unlock the content of this group

cant_remember_pass.message: Something went wrong! Cannot remember your password. Please, enter it again

open_tabs_delete_group.message: Open tabs and delete this group

new_name_saved.message: The new name has been saved

group_private_unlock_it.message: This group is private. You need to unlock it to see the options

group_created_without_tabs.message: Group created without any tabs selected

private_groups_are_secure.message: Private groups are secure and use encryption. Only users with the password can access them

enter_new_url_bind_private_to_new_url.message: Enter a new URL to bind your private group to this new URL. This group will be only visible in the list of groups only when you visit this specific URL. Do not forget to lock the group

enter_new_url_bind_to.message: Enter a new URL to bind to

type_any_image_url_to_set_it.message: Type any image URL to set it as a group icon

lock_group_after_restore.message: Lock the group back after restoring the tabs

i_confirm_want_delete_groups.message: I confirm that I want to delete all groups

confirm_want_delete_groups.message: Confirm that you want to delete all groups

all_groups_deleted.message: All the groups have been deleted

show_private_groups_incognito.message: Hide private groups everywhere but incognito (private) windows

go_to_settings_and_enable_allow_incognit.message: Go to the extension settings and enable the option 'Allow in incognito', 'Allow in Private' or 'Run in Private Windows'

override_existing_match.message: If the new group name matches an existing one, override it

only_private_groups_incognito.message: Hide public groups from browser incognito (private mode)

export_all_your_groups.message: Export all of your tab groups. Keep in mind that private groups are not going to be exported. If you want to export them, you need to do it for each private group separately

import_private_public_groups.message: Import private or public tab groups

choose_file_import.message: Please choose a file to import

some_groups_already_exist_same_name.message: Some groups that you want to import already exist with the same name. Do you want to replace them?

tab_pasted.message: The tab was pasted in the current group

image_format_allowed.message: Images are only allowed with these formats

uses_old_encrypt_impl.message: This group uses the old encryption implementation. You can fix it by unlocking this group and locking it back
